author: Odeinoichus
title: Swoggle me eyes Smee!
review:
Set #71012 Captain Hook: The third official Disney Villain in this series is another great iconic villain, the notorious Captain Hook.

Hook features a very distinguished and elegant look, decked out in red from head to toe he has dual-molded legs this time with some printing on it for his black boots. He has a lot of nice detailing for his long red coat on the top of his legs and both sides of his torso, he even has his little cuffs printed on the side of his arms. With a pearl gold rapier and a brand new hair piece with his long hair and hat Hook is a masterfully done minifigure.

I definitely recommend Captain Hook. All of the choices for Villains in this Series are rock solid and feature some great looking parts.

author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: So expressive
review:
Opening;

Captain hook is one of Disney's arguably most iconic villains and this Minifigure is so detailed and portrays the character perfectly .

The Minifigure -

The figure has a hair hat combo which is insane and dual moulded , it is huge and perfect , the head features some tired eyes and huge grin and a thin moustache , the torso is very accurate and depicts the cost which continues on to the legs , which are also dual moulded and printed on the front and sides and the arms are printed and he has a hook for one of his hands .

The accessory -

His single accessory is a fencing sword in pearl gold . The stand is the standard black CMF stand .

In conclusion -

this is a great figure which captures the personality of the character perfectly and is just a well made figure in general so I recommend it .
